fields.name: Defence (0x 70% charge):
fields.value: ** Target player cannot die by execution tomorrow. You may not use this ability on the same player two nights in a row

fields.name: **prosecution (0x, 100% Charge):**:
fields.value: ** For every 2 votes target player gets tomorrow, a third vote will secretly be cast for them.

fields.name: Client (Passive):
fields.value: ** A random non-town player is your client.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure your client wins the game
